Mahmoud Sayed

About Me

I'm a highly accomplished Senior Software Engineer with over 8 years of professional experience, currently based in Egypt. I demonstrate exceptional expertise in backend development, system architecture, performance optimization, and DevOps practices.

Currently at Accredible, I've evolved into a technical leader driving major infrastructure and product initiatives. From architecting real-time analytics dashboards processing millions of records to leading AWS infrastructure migrations, I combine deep technical expertise with strategic thinking.

As an ICPC World Finalist in 2017 and multiple-time competitive programming medalist, I bring exceptional algorithmic thinking and problem-solving skills to every challenge. This foundation has enabled me to consistently deliver significant performance improvements - from 10x faster page loads to 4x response time improvements throughout my career.
